name: Microsoft Word HTML Document
summary: A DOCHTML file is an HTML version of a document created with Microsoft Word, a word processing productivity application. It contains HTML source code that displays the document in a format similar to the original .DOC file. DOCHTML files are typically used for publishing and viewing document contents in a web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Word

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Word
